key_risks: Customer service issues and billing practices
Market competition from larger broadband providers and streaming services
Regulatory and legal risks in the telecommunications industry
controversies: Multiple customer complaints about poor customer service and unresolved issues
Recurring network outages and lack of timely communication to customers
social_issues: Network reliability concerns undermining social initiatives like free internet services during COVID-19
governance_issues: Customer service and network reliability issues potentially undermining governance credentials
